prod_short_desc: Protect NINJAGO® City from flying Manta Ray Bomber attack!
prod_long_desc:
Help Cole save Shen-Li in this cool THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ set, featuring the Manta Ray Bomber with 2 spring-loaded shooters, 2 bomb elements and a detachable boat. Includes 4 minifigures with assorted weapons and accessories to ramp up the role-play action possibilities.
Build the Manta Ray Bomber, featuring 2 spring-loaded shooters, two bomb elements and detachable boat able to sit two minifgures!
Featured in THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE
Includes 4 minifigures: Cole, Shen-Li, Great White and Shark Army Gunner
LEGO NINJAGO brick building toys are compatible with all other LEGO construction sets for creative building
Manta Ray Bomber measures over 4” high, 9” long and 12” wide. Detachable boat measures over 1” high, 3” long and 3” wide
341 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14
